snippet: The DanceMotion cultural exchange program has brought together the American company of David Dorfman and Korhan Basaran’s troupe from Istanbul for an hourlong work, “Unsettled,” at the BAM Fishman Space.
abstract: Brian Seibert reviews DanceMotion USA performance of work Unsettled by David Dorfman Dance and Korhan Basaran Company at BAM Fishman Space.
lead_paragraph: The DanceMotion cultural exchange program has brought together the American company of David Dorfman and Korhan Basaran’s troupe from Istanbul for an hourlong work, “Unsettled,” at the BAM Fishman Space.

headline.seo: David Dorfman and Korhan Basaran Troupes at BAM Fisher
headline.main: A Search for Reconciliation From the Mideast to America
headline.print_headline: A Search for Reconciliation From the Mideast to America
